description: Run a KSQL Query and stream back the Output. The response is streamed back until the LIMIT specified in the statement is reached or the flow is stopped.
requirements: Please upload these jar files to the flow: vertx-core, vertx-web-common, vertx-web-client. Release 4.0.0 or later.

properties.name: host
properties.label: Hostname
properties.description: Provide the hostname of the KSQL server. Don't use 'localhost' but use the IP address / hostname instead.

properties.name: port
properties.label: Port
properties.description: Provide the port of the KSQL server.

properties.name: username
properties.label: Username
properties.description: Provide a username if you need to authenticate to the KSQL server.

properties.name: password
properties.label: Password
properties.description: Provide a password if you need to authenticate to the KSQL server.

properties.name: propmap
properties.label: Property Mapping
properties.description: The query returns an array of values. Please provide a property names for each value.
